How to play Battleships

Rules

The objective of Battleships is to sink every ship of your opponent, before your ships are sunk. Players take turns firing at each others boards in attempt to hit an enemy ship.

Both players cant see the enemy ships. You need to guess where they are at.

When a player hits a ship, they can fire again until they miss a shot.

The first player to sink all enemy ships wins the game!

Controls

Before being able to start the game you need to place all your Ships on the board. To do this you can either:

  • Drag and drop the ships on to the board (single click to rotate them)
  • Press random to place your ships randomly

Once all ships are placed press the start button to start the game.
